Solina: As a result, Jude van Etina betrayed me and had acquired some of my strength. Thanks to the efforts of Anais, we were able to keep at least the most important artifact - Holy Chalice... But all the other artifacts found in Judith. Then, in order to get the power of the Seven Seals Einhasad, he created an organization called "Embryo".
